ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Carnal pauldrons
ygData.msgSnippet: reguarding invis in sol b, i know that the kobs and stuff see through the necro invis (gather shadows). most probably see through bard invis too -Minkin ...
ygData.messageBody:
reguarding invis in sol b, i know that the kobs and stuff see through the
necro invis (gather shadows). most probably see through bard invis too

-Minkin


-----Original Message-----
From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:emeeker@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2000 2:20 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Carnal pauldrons



Has anyone tried to get these at a low level? Or does anyone know SolB well
enough to say whether a low level could make the dash to loot them (and
survive waiting for them to drop)? Would I need inviso, or are there things
that see through it along the way (on, say a busy weekend night)?

As a possibly inappropriate aside, should there just HAPPEN to be someone
on the list who has spare money or items on Nameless and wants to have a
character on Povar who suddenly gets an inheritance, they should feel free
to contact me, Tszaaz/Tsengu would be happy to talk to you *smile*

Tszaaz-Povar/Tsengu-Nameless




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
